Private Member Functions

 AutoCompleteEditWidget ()

Detailed Description

An editable TextView that shows completion suggestions automatically while the user is typing.

The list of suggestions is displayed in a drop down menu from which the user can choose an item to replace the content of the edit box with.

void gaia::ui::AutoCompleteEditWidget::setThreshold ( int32_t  threshold)

Specifies the minimum number of characters the user has to type in the edit box before the drop down list is shown.

Parameters:
thresholdthe number of characters to type before the drop down is shown
Remarks:
When threshold is less than or equals 0, a threshold of 1 is applied.
See also:
getThreshold()
